message.body: Sweetie, I didn't want to be rude. I was just not in the mood for talking anymore work tonight : ) Sorry for that. Are you still at school?
Oh don't worry u weren't rude
Yes I was just about to text you
There is something I don't understand about fluster
Flusser
I don't get this shit about second order magical consciousness
What is this second order business
Yeah, I kinda did not get that point either. I was maybe planning to write it tomorrow before class.
Ceren you are never rude
I just get so testy. I really get lonely sometimes at school... I know you don't want to talk about school but I always do. What you doing At skeptic tomorrow? Will it be more fun than school ?
I just felt bad afterwards. I am sorry. It is a conference call thing. Don't think that will be more fun than school : ) we will see. Will you write the paper tonight?
Oh yeaah, you have Gunta in the morning.
I'm trying to
Don't have time tomorrow
I'm telling you it's too much teaching five hours in the morning
Then working in office
Then jan clas
It's terrible
Dude too much
Well u get some rest and do it in the morning
